

HLPENTRY.LBX
Entries:  41
Type:      5

Curiosity: the first record starts inside the last entry of the string table
is 0720, should be 0729



//  ; (sizeof=0xA)
struct s_HLP_ENTRY
{
    int16_t help_idx;
    int16_t x1;
    int16_t y1;
    int16_t x2;
    int16_t y2;
};

//  ; (sizeof=0x418)
struct s_HLP_DATA
{
    char title[30];
    char lbx_name[14];
    int16_t lbx_entry;
    int16_t Include_Entry;
    char help_text[1000];
};

    Set_Help_List(_help_entries, 25);
